name: Plugin Name:Woo Quick Order Table View
author: Abu Rayhan

sections.description: This is a flexible plugin for all users to show the products in table with search,ordering.It has also on click pop up details.Using shortcode [woo_qotv_code category=”pen,bag”] user can show it on the post or pages.From plugin settings user can choose header color,cell color,all font size,cart color and cart icon color.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Shortcode [woo_qotv_code] for show products on page or post.
  4. Only In Stock Products will show on the List
sections.faq:
Where can I find Shortcode for it?

Use [woo_qotv_code category=”bag,pen”] where bag and pen is category name.You can use single and multiple both category.

What is new on 2.1 version?

In the latest Version 2.1 you will get ordering,show numbers of products,pagination,settings from admin section where u can choose all color, font sizes and button color also.

You have any PRO version?

Yes.We have a pro version where you can see muti product add to cart,filtering,ordering,admin section.

Where i will get PRO version?

For get PRO version you have to contact shojibvai@gmail.com or go to http://amp-templates.com.

Where is the settings option for the plugin?

You can see it under settings menu.Under settings it is called Quick Order table View Settings.

Can i put shortcode on page or posts?

Yes you can.But you need to make sure your post/page editor support shortcode.

Can i change image size on pop up?

Yes you can if you know basic php and css.We will add all of these featues in new versions.

Out Of Stock Products Will Show on the table?

No.Only Products which are on stock will show here on table.

Where is the demo ?

see here for demo http://amp-templates.com/quick-order-demo
sections.changelog:
1.1 – 07/09/16

  • Added shortcode for show product in table view.
  • Added pop up for show products title,image,price and sku.

1.2 – 21/09/16

  • Out of stock Products are removed from list

2 – 26/10/16

  • table view of the products.people can choose there category.they can select multiple category or single category using short code.
  • People can choose how many products they want to show per page.I mean pagination system.
  • If product is variable there have options to select the variable attributes for them.
  • People can add any number of products directly on add to cart button from it.
  • If people click on the featured image it opens a pop up and show title,image,category,short description,price,sku.
  • On table it shows Featured Image,Title,Quantity button and add to cart button.
  • User can choose there table colors also they can choose there table top row color with short code.
  • People can choose order like asc or desc.

2.1 – 11/21/17

  • Order Syatem,Order By Product Name,Price
  • Ajax add to cart
  • Checkout Button after add cart
  • Select number of Products they want to show from dropdown
  • Auto pagination
  • Ajax products search
  • Admin settings for choose header color,cell color,font size of header and cells,add to cart background and icon color.
  • Easy responsive for mobile
  • Pro version has a lots more features like multi product add to cart,multiple filtering

2.2 – 27/02/18

  • If image is missing shows demo image
  • Pro version is live now with translation and other great features
  • Work with woocommerce lastest version

short_description: Woocommerce Products shows on table with filetring,ordering,pagination,lightbox,add to cart,admin settings everything just with single shortcode.
